description: DevOps Skills - Intelligent DevOps skills for Claude Code.
author: Akin Ozer

hooks.prompt:
MANDATORY SKILL ACTIVATION SEQUENCE

Step 1 - EVALUATE:
For each skill in <available_skills>, state: [skill-name] - YES/NO - [reason]

Step 2 - ACTIVATE:
IF any skills are YES -> Use Skill(skill-name) tool for EACH relevant skill NOW
IF no skills are YES -> State "No skills needed" and proceed

Step 3 - IMPLEMENT:
Only after Step 2 is complete, proceed with implementation.

CRITICAL: You MUST call Skill() tool in Step 2. Do NOT skip to implementation.

Example:
- dockerfile-generator: YES - creating a new Dockerfile
- dockerfile-validator: YES - need to validate generated Dockerfile
- k8s-yaml-validator: NO - not working with Kubernetes manifests

Then IMMEDIATELY use Skill() tool:
> Skill(dockerfile-generator)
> Skill(dockerfile-validator)

THEN and ONLY THEN start implementation
